body.p: To his Exelency Beriah Magoffin Esq Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky the undersigned would Respectfully represent that at the october Term of the Franklin circut court Richard Hamelton was tried for Grand Larceny and found guilty and sentenced to the Penetintary for 2 years as we believe that he is inocent and we further represent that he has a very nice wife and a large family and we most earstly ask your Excellency to pardon Said Hamilton we herewith refer to the Evidence on the trial in a bill of Exceptions Signed by the Hon. E. F. S. Nutall Judge as part of this Petition in which you will find all the facts. in the case --
